title: Who Speaks for the Lazy? - author implies laziness

content.question: In the second paragraph, the author primarily implies that laziness is a

choices.label: factor contributing to failure but not the sole cause
common characteristic among intellectuals and artists
personal trait that people try to hide from one another
psychological problem that may be cured through therapy

content.answer: factor contributing to failure but not the sole cause

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
